description: Commands that work with multiple emojis.

options.name: unlock_all
options.description: Unlock all emojis from a server

options.name: role
options.description: The role to be removed from the emojis.

options.name: ignore_emojis
options.description: Prevent specific emojis from getting unlocked.

options.name: lock_all
options.description: Lock all emojis from a server to a role
The role to be added to the emojis.
Prevent specific emojis from getting locked.

options.name: locked
options.description: List of which emojis are locked to which role

options.name: stats
options.description: See how many emojis you uploaded or how many emojis you locked

options.name: hidden
options.description: Hide the message from other users

options.name: add_multiple
options.description: Add multiple emojis to the server by using emojis from other servers
The emojis you want to add

options.name: delete_multiple
options.description: Delete multiple emojis at once from your server
The emojis you want to delete

options.name: delete_latest
options.description: Delete the latest emojis uploaded to your server

options.name: amount
options.description: The amount of emojis you want to delete
Reset the roles of every emoji from this server
Prevent specific emojis from getting reset.

options.name: lock_multiple
options.description: Lock multiple emojis to a role
The emojis you want to lock
The role to be added to the emojis

options.name: unlock_multiple
options.description: Unlock multiple emojis from a role
The emojis you want to unlock
The role to be unlocked to the emojis

options.name: list_category
options.description: Create an emoji list with custom categories
The emojis that will be in the category list
The name for the category
The channel where you want to create the emoji category

options.name: quote_before_emojis
options.description: Choose if you want to have the quote line before

options.name: divider
options.description: Choose if you want to use a divider between the emojis or not

options.name: webhook_name
options.description: Use a custom name for the webhook message

options.name: webhook_avatar
options.description: Use a custom avatar for the webhook message

options.name: list_auto_update_remove
options.description: Disable the auto update of the emoji list

options.name: list
options.description: Create a list of the emojis from your server with the emoji ids

options.name: auto_update_list
options.description: Choose if you want to automatically update the list or not
Ignore specific emojis in the list

options.name: sort_after
options.description: Sort the emojis alphabetically or after the creation date

options.name: exclude_non_or_animated_emojis
options.description: Exclude animated or non animated emojis from the list

options.name: exclude_locked_emojis
options.description: Choose if want to list emojis that are locked to a role in the message or not

options.name: show_full_emoji_id
options.description: Choose if you want to show the full ID of the emoji next the emoji or only the name

options.name: message_before_emojis
options.description: Add a custom message before the emojis list

options.name: webhook_name
options.description: Use a custom name for the webhook message

options.name: webhook_avatar
options.description: Use a custom avatar for the webhook message

options.name: webhook
options.description: Choose if the message should be send with a webhook or not.

options.name: divider
options.description: Choose if you want to use a divider between the emojis or not

options.name: update_timestamp
options.description: Choose if you want to have a timestamp under the emojis list or not

options.name: update_timestamp_type
options.description: Choose the type of timestamp you want to use

choices.name: Long Date/Time example Wednesday, June 29, 2022 9:12 PM
Relative Time example a few seconds ago
